title: Four Level Condo near Van Aken District
posting_body: Four level condo in the heart of the Van Aken district with 3 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, plus office/den, Great room, 2 decks - roof top and kitchen level (plenty of room for grill and furniture), kitchen with butler's pantry and plenty of storage areas, new appliances, hardwood floors and granite countertops.
Next to RTA w/ quick access to Downtown and University Circle!
